/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the scene. On the right side of the street, there's a building with a white facade and a red roof, standing out against the greenery. A few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day. Cars are parked along the street, adding to the urban feel of the scene. The image captures a typical day in Beijing, with its blend of nature and urban life.
